Package progetto.network.rmi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRemoteClientSession
    this is the interface of the object that is created on the client and sent to the server as a remote.
    IRemoteLogger
    this is the inteface that is exposed by the server rmi implementation to allow a client to connect.
    IRemoteServerSession
    This is the object that is created on the server and is sent to the client to allow him to send requests
  • Class Summary

    RMIClient

    RMIHandler
    rmi implementation of INetworkHandler
